Plot: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.
Title: Inspector Gadget
Writer: Andy Heyward (characters), Jean Chalopin (characters), Bruno Bianchi (characters), Dana Olsen (story), Kerry Ehrin (story), Kerry Ehrin (screenplay), Zak Penn (screenplay)
Actors: Matthew Broderick, Rupert Everett, Joely Fisher, Michelle Trachtenberg
tomatoConsensus: Despite an abundance of eyecandy, the film doesn't amount to much.
